dublinCore.dc:title: 114 HR 2168 IH: West Coast Dungeness Crab Management Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Herrera Beutler (for herself, Mr. Larsen of Washington, Mr. Kilmer, Mr. DeFazio, and Mr. Schrader) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To make the current Dungeness crab fishery management regime permanent and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the West Coast Dungeness Crab Management Act.

Section 203 of the Act entitled An Act to approve a governing international agreement between the United States and the Republic of Poland, and for other purposes, approved November 13, 1998 (Public Law 105–384; 16 U.S.C. 1856 note) is amended—
